column1: Little Goat Diner////The food that we did get was pretty good
column2: but I wasn't blown away like I was expecting to be. I had the Parathas Burrito
column3: and I ate the whole thing because I was so hungry
column4: but I probably wouldn't order it again. I was still hungry after I finished and just felt like I could make something better at home. I will say that the goat chili is worth trying. It was hearty and had good flavor. My friends said their food was good
column5: but nobody was raving about anything. I'd give this place another try
column6: but I would try to arrive a little earlier in the future.
